articles.title: FPG Berhad and Bina Harta Group Sign Landmark Agreement to Advance Affordable Housing (Residensi Wilayah)
articles.content:
Today, in a formal signing ceremony, First Pavilion Global Berhad (FPG Berhad) proudly entered into a strategic partnership with Bina Harta Group, reinforcing a shared commitment to support the Malaysian government’s initiatives for affordable housing (Residensi Wilayah). This collaboration, marked by the signing of this agreement, represents a significant step towards developing quality, accessible homes in prime areas, including Sentul, Selayang, and Mont Kiara, with a project value GDV of RM400 million.

Residensi Wilayah, formerly known as RUMAWIP, is an affordable housing program that provides more comfortable, quality and affordable homes for residents of the Federal Territories. For FPG Berhad, this investment is deeply meaningful, reflecting our dedication to enhancing the lives of Malaysians by supporting their aspirations for homeownership. FPG Berhad provide quality homes for low income families by improving & helping their living standards. Residensi Wilayah is vital to fostering vibrant, inclusive communities, and we are honored to contribute to a future where quality housing is accessible to all. This partnership embodies FPG Berhad’s core values of sustainability, social impact, and responsible development, allowing us to make a positive, lasting difference in the lives of Malaysian families.

articles.title: This landmark agreement highlights the shared vision of FPG Berhad and Bina Harta Group to stimulate economic growth, promote social equity, and deliver high-quality housing. Together, we aim to create homes that not only fulfill current needs but also pave the way for a sustainable, resilient future for Malaysia.
First Pavilion Global Berhad Becomes Accredited Partner of Blockchain Council
articles.content:
First Pavilion Global Berhad is proud to announce its accreditation as a partner of the Blockchain Council. This prestigious recognition allows First Pavilion Global Berhad to offer official training and certifications on behalf of the Blockchain Council in Malaysia.

The Blockchain Council is a leading global organization dedicated to advancing education and adoption of blockchain technology. Their comprehensive curriculum and certifications equip individuals with the knowledge and skills needed to thrive in the ever-evolving blockchain landscape.

We are excited to embark on this partnership with the Blockchain Council and offer their industry-leading training and certifications in Malaysia. We are confident that this collaboration will play a pivotal role in advancing blockchain education and adoption in the country.

Contact Us
For more information about First Pavilion Global Berhad’s Blockchain Council training programs, please reach out to us at +603-4816 6106 or info@fpgsc.com.
